item0.name: Everfrost
item0.description:
80 Ability Power
200 Health
600 Mana
20 Ability Haste

Active - Glaciate: Deal (100 + 30% Ability Power) magic damage in a cone, Slowing enemies by 65% for 1.5 seconds. Enemies at the center of the cone are Rooted instead (20s cooldown).

Mythic Passive: Grants all other Legendary items 15 Ability Power.

item1.name: Corrupting Potion
item1.description:
Active - Consume: Consumes a charge to restore 125 Health and 75 Mana over 12 seconds. During this time, damaging Abilities and Attacks burn enemy champions for 15 (20 if you cannot gain Mana) magic damage over 3 seconds. Holds up to 3 charges and refills upon visiting the shop.

Corrupting damage is reduced to 50% when triggered by area of effect or periodic damage.

item2.name: Hextech Alternator
item2.description:
40 Ability Power
  • Revved: Damaging a champion deals an additional 50 - 125 (based on level) magic damage (40s cooldown).

item3.name: Dark Seal
item3.description:
15 Ability Power
40 Health
  • Glory: Gain 2 stacks for a champion kill or 1 stacks for an assist (up to 10 stacks total). Lose 4 stacks on death.
  • Dread: Grants 5 Ability Power per stack of Glory.

    Obtained Glory stacks are preserved between this item and Mejai's Soulstealer.

item4.name: Banshee's Veil
item4.description:
80 Ability Power
45 Magic Resist
10 Ability Haste
  • Annul: Grants a Spell Shield that blocks the next enemy Ability (40s cooldown).

    Item cooldown is restarted if you take damage from champions before it is completed.

item5.description:

45 Move Speed
  • Gain 12 Summoner Spell Haste.

    ''This item is dedicated in honor of Ionia's victory over Noxus in the Rematch for the Southern Provinces on 10 December, 20 CLE.'

item6.name: Farsight Alteration
item6.description: Active - Trinket: Reveals an area and places a visible, fragile Ward up to 4000 units away. Allies cannot target this Ward with Summoner Spells or Abilities (198 - 99s cooldown).

item1.description:
115 Ability Power
  • Focus Fire: Damaging a champion with a non-targeted Ability at over 700 range or Immobilizing them Reveals them and increases their damage taken from you by 10% for 6 seconds.

    The Ability that triggers Focus Fire also benefits from the damage increase. Pets and non-immobilizing traps do not trigger this effect. Only the initial placement of zone Abilities will trigger this effect.
